title: pame_gera
author: pame_gera
content: Suidex AMM is an innovative platform that operates as an Automated Market Maker (AMM) on the SUI blockchain. Its primary aim is to enable safe and decentralized token swaps for users. The protocol utilizes smart contracts developed by the team, written in the MOVE language and published on the SUI mainnet/testnet.One of the significant advantages of SuiDex is that it allows for uncorrelated token swaps, enabling users to trade directly from their wallet app. This feature enhances the convenience and accessibility of the platform for users.Furthermore, the platform provides stable swaps for correlated assets, utilizing a different liquidity curve. This approach allows users to trade different assets with a relative level of stability, thereby minimizing the risk associated with token swapping.In addition to its primary features, SuiDex also has a treasury that receives a part of every swap transaction fee. This structure enables the platform to generate revenue, which can be reinvested in the development and expansion of the platform.The MOVE language used in developing SuiDex is a new smart contract language designed with security in mind. This feature ensures that the smart contracts used in the platform are secure and less vulnerable to hacks or malicious attacks.SuiDex also boasts high-speed transactions, ensuring that users can execute trades quickly and efficiently. Furthermore, the trading fees on the platform are relatively lower compared to other top decentralized exchanges, making it a cost-effective option for users.
